name: Push the Sheep
description:
The sheep are hungry!

But they don't know how to find the grass on their own.
Push them to the grass so they can eat.
But be careful, you don't want one getting in the way of the other.

Push the sheep is a game where you have to think to solve the puzzles and proceed to the next level.

Each level more challenging than the next, and don't be fooled by the childish graphics, only the greatest geniuses are able to make it to the end.

Push all the sheep into each bush to win the stage.
You can only push, never pull, but don't worry, you still can undo every move you made.
